result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Deshon Contrell Matthews

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Deshon Contrell Matthews not in court, in custody.  Attorney Tedia K. Gamino appeared by video for Deshon Contrell Matthews.  Attorney Patrick T. Franken in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for Bail Bond Hearing. Defendant not produced. Arguments heard as to bail. Court denied bail motion for today's purposes. Case remains calendared as previously set.
Attorney Tedia K Gamino requested a bail/bond hearing; both parties notified by email of date and time. Bail/bond hearing scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 1:30 pm.
Notice of Motion and Motion for severance of Defendants.  Received and Filed.  nk

Defendant Deshon Contrell Matthews appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Tedia K. Gamino appeared by video for Deshon Contrell Matthews.  Attorney Amy E Spanczak for Patrick T. Franken in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for final pretrial.  Defense to file motion to sever and requested motion hearing date.  Court VACATED jury trial.  Defense to file motions by November 8, 2022.  State to file motion response by November 22, 2022.  Court order case adjourned for motion hearing, final pretrial and for jury trial in Branch 16;  IN PERSON.  Motion hearing scheduled for November 29, 2022 at 10:00 am.  Final pre-trial scheduled for December 22, 2022 at 09:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for January 9, 2023 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Deshon Contrell Matthews not in court, in custody.  Attorney Tedia K. Gamino appeared by video for Deshon Contrell Matthews.  Defendant's appearance waived.  Attorney Patrick T. Franken appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for final pretrial.  Defendant not produced for zoom appearance.  Court ordered case adjourned for final pre-trial conference in Branch 16; VIA ZOOM.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 26, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Received and Filed. Motion in Limine
Received and Filed. STATES REQUESTED JURY INSTRUCTION
Received and Filed. STATES WITNESS LIST
Received and Filed. DEFENDANTS MOTION IN LIMINE

OFF THE RECORD- Attorney Tedia K. Gamino in court, defendant Deshon Contrell Matthews not in court, in custody.  Patrick T. Franken appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Scheduling Conference. All parties appeared via zoom. Defendant not produced. Defense counsel informs court that they have received discovery materials and an offer from the state. Further, defense is requesting Final Pre-Trial and Jury trial dates. Court grants request and sets 08/17/2022 deadline for filing trial documents. Case adjourned to Br 16.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 24, 2022 at 10:00 am.  Jury trial scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Deshon Contrell Matthews in court with attorney Tedia K. Gamino.  Defendant Deshon Contrell Matthews in custody.  Samantha Raygo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Court took judicial notice of 17CF318.  Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Bryan Young.    State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 16 by zoom.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Received and Filed. SPD Order Appointing Counsel
Received and Filed. Public Defender Order Appointing Counsel
Received and Filed. SPD Order Appointing Counsel

Defendant Deshon Contrell Matthews in court by video, in custody.  Erika Strebel appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness was present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 13, 2022 at 10:30 am.

OFF THE RECORD: Parties are not present.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing 2/22/2022. Milwaukee County Office of Emergency Management declared a snow emergency for 2/22/2022 therefore this matter will be rescheduled. Case is adjourned for CAUSE a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.   This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription.  The Court ordered defendant to maintain ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Deshon Contrell Matthews in court with attorney Darryl Everett Smith.  Defendant Deshon Contrell Matthews in custody.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deshon Contrell Matthews appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Grayson, Branch 16. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 22, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
